1.name: The Shining
1.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

2.name: Raging Bull
2.description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

3.name: Friday the 13th
3.description: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which, years before, was the site of a child's drowning.

4.name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
4.description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

5.name: Airplane!
5.description: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

6.name: The Blues Brothers
6.description: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

7.name: Urban Cowboy
7.description: Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.

8.name: Caddyshack
8.description: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

9.name: Cannibal Holocaust
9.description: During a rescue mission into the Amazon rainforest, a professor stumbles across lost film shot by a missing documentary crew.

10.name: The Blue Lagoon
10.description: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

11.name: Popeye
11.description: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

12.name: The Elephant Man
12.description: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

13.name: The Fog
13.description: An unearthly fog rolls into a small coastal town exactly 100 years after a ship mysteriously sank in its waters.

14.name: Flash Gordon
14.description: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.

15.name: Dressed to Kill
15.description: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

16.name: Prom Night
16.description: At a high school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

17.name: Xanadu
17.description: A struggling artist living in Los Angeles meets a girl who may hold the key to his happiness.

18.name: Bronco Billy
18.description: An idealistic, modern-day cowboy struggles to keep his Wild West show afloat in the face of hard luck and waning interest.

19.name: Ordinary People
19.description: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.

20.name: Altered States
20.description: A Harvard scientist conducts experiments on himself with a hallucinatory drug and an isolation chamber that may be causing him to regress genetically.

21.name: Nine to Five
21.description: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

22.name: Superman II
22.description: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

23.name: The Changeling
23.description: A man staying at a secluded historical mansion finds himself being haunted by the presence of a spectre.

24.name: The Final Countdown
24.description: A modern aircraft carrier is thrown back in time to 1941 near Hawaii, just hours before the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

25.name: Humanoids from the Deep
25.description: Scientific experiments backfire and produce horrific mutations: half man, half fish, which terrorize a small fishing village by killing the men and raping the women.

26.name: Battle Beyond the Stars
26.description: A young farmer sets out to recruit mercenaries to defend his peaceful planet, which is under threat of invasion by the evil tyrant Sador and his armada of aggressors.

27.name: Cruising
27.description: A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

28.name: Brubaker
28.description: The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.

29.name: Somewhere in Time
29.description: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

30.name: Fame
30.description: A chronicle of the lives of several teenagers who attend a New York high school for students gifted in the performing arts.

31.name: Coal Miner's Daughter
31.description: Biographical story of Loretta Lynn, a legendary country singer that came from poverty to worldwide fame. She rose from humble beginnings in Kentucky to superstardom and changing the sound and style of country music forever.

32.name: Alligator
32.description: A baby alligator is flushed down a Chicago toilet and survives by eating discarded laboratory rats injected with growth hormones. The small reptile grows gigantic, escapes the city sewers, and goes on a rampage.

33.name: Inferno
33.description: An American college student in Rome and his sister in New York investigate a series of killings in both locations where their resident addresses are the domain of two covens of witches.

34.name: Heaven's Gate
34.description: A dramatization of the real-life Johnson County War in 1890 Wyoming, in which a Sheriff born into wealth, attempts to protect immigrant farmers from rich cattle interests.

35.name: The Gods Must Be Crazy
35.description: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

36.name: Maniac
36.description: A psychotic man, troubled by his childhood abuse, loose in New York City, kills young women and takes their scalps as his trophies. Will he find the perfect woman in a photographer, and end his killing spree?

37.name: American Gigolo
37.description: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

38.name: Stir Crazy
38.description: Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in.

39.name: The Watcher in the Woods
39.description: When a family moves to a country home, the young girls experience strange happenings that have a link to an occult event years past.

40.name: Little Darlings
40.description: Two fifteen year-old girls from different sides of the tracks compete to see who will be first to lose their virginity while at camp.

41.name: Saturn 3
41.description: Two lovers stationed at a remote base in the asteroid fields of Saturn are intruded upon by a retentive technocrat from Earth and his charge: a malevolent eight foot robot.

42.name: Any Which Way You Can
42.description: A trucker turned prize fighter, his brother and their pet orangutan have a series of misadventures involving the mob, corrupt cops, motorcycle gangs and pretty dames.

43.name: The Long Good Friday
43.description: An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

44.name: My Bodyguard
44.description: When a boy comes to a new school and gets harassed by a bully, he acquires the services of the school's most feared kid as a bodyguard.

45.name: Mangiati vivi!
45.description: A young woman teams up with an adventurer to find her missing sister in the jungles of New Guinea and they stumble upon a religious cult led by a deranged preacher whom has located his commune in an area inhabited by cannibals.

46.name: Paura nella città dei morti viventi
46.description: A reporter and a psychic race to close the Gates of Hell after the suicide of a clergyman caused them to open, allowing the dead to rise from their graves.

47.name: Kagemusha
47.description: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

48.name: The Ninth Configuration
48.description: A former marine arrives at a mental asylum housed in a remote castle to run it. There he attempts to rehabilitate the patients by letting them act out their craziest fantasies and desires.

49.name: Midnight Madness
49.description: Leon planned "the great all-nighter" by picking college students to participate in an all-night long scavenger hunt. The 5 teams are given clues to solve, leading them to the next clue, ...                See full summary »

50.name: Atlantic City, USA
50.description: In a corrupt city, a small-time gangster and the estranged wife of a pot dealer find themselves thrown together in an escapade of love, money, drugs and danger.
